plantuml_diagram:
@startuml
!define AWSPuml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/awslabs/aws-icons-for-plantuml/v20.0/dist
!include AWSPuml/AWSCommon.puml

skinparam shadowing false
skinparam componentStyle rectangle
skinparam wrapWidth 200
skinparam maxMessageSize 200

title Deployment Architecture - Go SSH Key Authorizer Daemon (Containerized)

actor "Operator" as operator
cloud "External HTTP Service\nKey Map JSON\n(SK A_KEY_URI)" as keymap

node "Host Machine / VM" as host {
  node "Container Runtime\n(Docker / containerd)" as runtime {
    artifact "Container Image\nQuay.io registry" as registry

    node "Container: SSH Key Authorizer\nGo (net/http, encoding/json)\nUses: x/crypto/ssh" as app {
      component "Daemon Process" as daemon
      component "HTTP Client\nFetch key map JSON" as httpclient
      component "Authorized Keys Writer\nWrites authorized_keys" as writer
    }
  }

  database "Host Filesystem Volume\nMount: SKA_AKF_LOC\n(authorized_keys path)" as volume
}

cloud "CI/CD" as cicd {
  component "GitHub Actions\n(build/push image)" as gha
  component "GoReleaser\n(GitHub Releases artifacts)" as goreleaser
}

operator --> gha : push/tag

gha --> registry : build & push container image

goreleaser --> registry : (optional) publish image

goreleaser --> operator : publish binaries\n(GitHub Releases)

registry --> runtime : pull image

httpclient --> keymap : HTTPS GET\nkey map JSON

writer --> volume : write authorized_keys

daemon --> httpclient

daemon --> writer

@enduml

architecture_description:
## High-level architecture

### Runtime / deployment
- **Host Machine / VM** runs a **container runtime** (Docker/containerd).
- A single **containerized background/daemon application** is deployed:
  - **SSH Key Authorizer Daemon** implemented in **Go** using the standard library (**net/http**, **encoding/json**) and **golang.org/x/crypto/ssh**.

### External dependencies
- The daemon depends on an **outbound HTTP(S) endpoint** that serves a **key map JSON**.
  - Configured via environment variable **`SKA_KEY_URI`**.

### Host resources
- The container requires a **host filesystem mount/volume** to write SSH authorized keys.
  - Target path configured via **`SKA_AKF_LOC`** (location of `authorized_keys`).

### Build & release pipeline
- **GitHub Actions** builds the container image and pushes it to **Quay.io** (container registry).
- **GoReleaser** publishes release artifacts (binaries) to **GitHub Releases** and may also publish container images depending on configuration.

### Key relationships / data flows
- CI/CD produces and publishes the container image to **Quay.io**.
- The host runtime **pulls** the image and runs the daemon container.
- The daemon:
  1) **Fetches** key map JSON from the external HTTP service (`SKA_KEY_URI`).
  2) **Writes** the resulting `authorized_keys` content to the mounted host volume (`SKA_AKF_LOC`).
